arrays.title: Arrays
arrays.description: Arrays are a fundamental data structure that store elements at contiguous memory locations.

linked-lists.title: Linked Lists
linked-lists.description: Linked Lists are a sequence of elements where each element points to the next, allowing for efficient insertions and deletions.

trees.title: Trees
trees.description: Trees are a hierarchical data structure used to represent hierarchical relationships.

sorting.title: Sorting Algorithms
sorting.description: Sorting algorithms arrange the elements of a list in a specific order (e.g., ascending or descending).

searching.title: Searching Algorithms
searching.description: Searching algorithms are used to find specific elements in data structures like arrays or trees.
